content: In order to deal with repeat offenders, Mr Johnson is also establishing a "two strikes and you're out" policy - serious breaches of the rules will result in permanent removal of free travel rights.
translations: ita:Per potere affrontare i criminali recidivi, il signor Johnson sta anche stabilendo una politica due colpi e sei fuoriï¹• g
